Content: Colombo (News1st): Lanka IOC announced prices of all IOC Petrol and Diesel were reduced by Rs. 5 which went into effect midnight yesterday (November 30). Revised prices are : Lanka Auto Diesel : Rs. 106/- Lanka Super Diesel Euro 04 : Rs. 131/- 92 Octane Petrol : Rs. 143/- 95 Octane Petrol Euro 04 : Rs. 162/-
